registry.title: Language Subtags, Tag Extensions, and Tags
Language Subtag Registry
registry.note: Registration requests should be submitted to the ietf-languages@ietf.org mailing list. For more information, see , Section 3.5.

The format of the registry is explained in Section 3 and Section 3.1 of .
When referring to language tags in specifications, please refer to .
Language subtag registration forms are available in the Language Subtag Registration Form Archive.

registry.title: Language Tag Extensions
registry.note: While registration requires IESG approval or an IETF Stream RFC, the maintaining authority for an extension can submit changes to contact information and/or URLs directly to IANA, as described in , Section 5.2.

registry.title: Language Tags (OBSOLETE)
registry.note: This registry is obsolete and has been replaced by the Language Subtag Registry, as described in , Section 5.1.
Language tag registration forms are available in the Language Tag Registration Form Archive.
